scripts.lint: npm run -C ./server lint && npm run -C ./client lint
scripts.build: npm run -C ./server build && npm run -C ./client build
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run -C ./server dev" "npm run -C ./client ng serve"
scripts.install:all: npm install && npm -C ./server install && npm -C ./client install
scripts.devdb: docker exec -it rss_postgres psql rss -U rss
